The image depicts a chaotic scene in the French National Assembly. Prime Minister Élisabeth Borne is standing at the podium, addressing the assembly. She is wearing a patterned jacket and appears to be speaking into a microphone. The background is filled with numerous lawmakers, many of whom are holding up signs that read '64 ANS C'EST NON!' (64 years is not okay!) and 'DEMOCRATIE'. The atmosphere is tense and confrontational, with some lawmakers shouting and gesturing aggressively. The seating area is filled with red chairs, and the walls are adorned with wooden panels and decorative elements. The overall mood conveys a sense of protest and dissent against the government's decision to raise the retirement age.
The French National Assembly is a legislative body in France. It is composed of representatives elected by the people to make laws and oversee the government.
The speaker is standing at the podium, addressing the assembly. They are wearing a formal outfit and appear to be in the middle of delivering a speech.
A group of individuals in the assembly are holding up signs that read '64 ANS C'EST NON!' and 'DEMOCRATIE.' They appear to be protesting against a proposed change in retirement age.
The podium is where the speaker stands to address the assembly. It is ornately decorated with a golden emblem.
The signs held by the protestors are white with black text. They express dissent against a specific policy.

The image captures a dynamic moment during a basketball game. Two players are in the foreground, engaged in an intense play. The player on the left is wearing a black jersey with the number 20 and the word 'Princeton' written across the chest. He is in the process of shooting the ball, which he holds above his head with both hands extended. His posture suggests a strong, focused effort to make the shot. The player on the right is wearing a white jersey with red trim and the name 'Larsson' and the number 3 on it. He is attempting to block the shot, with both arms raised high and his body leaning towards the shooter. The background shows a crowded arena with spectators in the stands, creating an atmosphere of excitement and tension. The lighting highlights the players and the ball, emphasizing the action and intensity of the moment.

The image depicts a scene on a sandy beach where the ocean waves are gently crashing onto the shore. The sand is dark and wet, indicating recent wave activity. In the foreground, there is an orange life vest lying on the sand. The life vest appears to be deflated or partially deflated, with black straps attached to it. The waves in the background are white and frothy, suggesting movement and the natural rhythm of the sea. The overall atmosphere of the image conveys a sense of solitude and perhaps a hint of melancholy, as the life vest seems out of place and abandoned on the beach.
An orange life jacket with black straps, lying on the wet sand near the water's edge.
Waves crashing onto the shore, creating white foam.
Dark, wet sand where the waves meet the shore.

The image depicts a group of baseball players from the Puerto Rico team celebrating on a field. The players are wearing red and blue uniforms with 'Puerto Rico' written across the chest.
